attributes.action: Recognise that many vehicles polute, not just a particular kind of vehicle.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would seem to be a popular myth that all 4x4s are polluting. There is an increasing clamour from bigots to ban some cars simply because they are designed with 'all wheel drive'. In itself a vehicle transmission system can not be bad for the environment. Many 4x4s are capable of extremely good fuel consumption. Also, many other different type of vehicle produce high emissions.
